title: Jazz Age Lawn Party
seo_title: Jazz Age Lawn Party | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: For two weekends every year, Governors Island steps back in time to celebrate the Jazz Age era.
preview: For two weekends every year, Governors Island steps back in time to celebrate the Jazz Age era.
contents: For two weekends every year, Governors Island steps back in time to celebrate the Jazz Age era. Created by Michael Arenella, leader of the Dreamland Orchestra, the Jazz Age Lawn Party puts the finest music, dance, fashion and cocktails of the 1920s on display, all set to the tune of the Dreamland Orchestra which transcribes by hand their entire repertoire from period recordings. Visit the Jazz Age Lawn Party website for more information on tickets, performances and getting to Governors Island.
